EmailTemplate.name: NCS Action Day N and West
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Action Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Grads,
Just a reminder that to get access to the Silent/Headphone Disco you can still purchase tickets HERE -
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ncs-action-day-london-celebration-tickets-15875011587
GET THEM QUICK OR TELL A FRIEND AS THERE ARE ONLY A FEW LEFT!
A limited number of tickets will also be available on the day.
NCS ACTION DAY DETAILS:
Time: 4pm - 8.30PM - YOU MUST BE ON TIME! Location: 47-49 Tanner Street, Southwark (near london bridge station) Please bring a minimum of Â£5 for the headphone deposit! See you there!
